CustomField.description: Used to display limited case statuses to support center users
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Status) = 'New', $Label.Community_Case_Status_New, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Internal', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Customer', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Awaiting_your_response, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Customer - Need More Info', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Awaiting_your_response, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Customer - Info Provided', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Awaiting_your_response, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Customer - Need More Info - 8', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Awaiting_your_response, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Customer - Need Info provided - 8', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Awaiting_your_response, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Fix', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Fix Review', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - System Issue', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - CSM/Sales', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - ENG Task', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - 3rd Party', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending - Product Enhancement', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Customer has replied', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Closed, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed - First Response', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Closed, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed - Unresolved', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Closed, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed as Duplicate', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Closed, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed - First Response', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Closed_Awaiting, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed - Customer Has Replied', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Need To Close', $Label.Community_Case_Status_Resolved, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '') + IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Resolved', $Label.Community_Case_Status_In_Progress, '')
CustomField.label: Case Status
